item.content:encoded:
Price: $189.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:39 UTC – Details)



【ERGONOMIC DESIGN OFFICE CHAIR–Improve Your Posture】The design of the backrest fits the shape of the human spine, with the adjustable lumbar support, the office chair will give your back strong support. And the thick seat also can relieve the hip pressure to offer you comfort. Thick padded back & seat take this chair to the next level of comfort. Choose this office chair, choose comfort.
【Breathable & Comfortable】The backrest and headrest are made of high-quality breathable polyester mesh to keep you cool and comfortable. High-density foam-filled seat cushion resists deformation to provide the support that lasts all day long.
【Flexible Adjustment】Adjustable headrest and armrests show the flexibility of the ergonomic office chairs, you can adjust the height of the headrest and armrests according to your needs, finding the best position to perfectly support your neck, cervical spine, shoulders and arms to get the maximum relaxation. By adjusting the seat height to meet your work and daily needs.
【Safe & Reliable】The four-stage steel gas spring and heavy-duty nylon legs with max. load of 300LB, certified by BIFMA and SGS. The thickened explosion-proof steel chassis is hard-wearing, all the details make this desk office chair use longer. The quiet chair wheel wrapped by PU can smoothly rotate 360°.

For several years, we have been committed to making office furniture better, more ergonomic, and increasing consumer comfort. From the brand

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ！

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

【Stepless Dimming with two control ways】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
【Space Saving and Modern Style】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
【Quality Warranty】SHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

Specifications:

Material: metal + silicone

Light bar length: 18.2 inch/ 46 cm

LED numbers: 96 Led beads

Lumen: 1511 Lumen

Brightness: 6 levels

Color temperature: 3000K-6000K

CRI: RA>95

Control type: Touch & Remote

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading.

  • No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently
  • 360°flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction
  • Durable structure with metal and silicone
  • Metal Clamp: 2.6 inch/7.5 cm thickness desk edge
  • Maximum Lighting height: 28.5 inch

Read more

HIGH COLOR RENDERING

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

It supports two types to control the study lamp

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

  • Short touch will change the color
  • Holding touch will change the brightness

Remote Control

  • Dimming Up / Down: 6 Brightness levels
  • Colors Select: Warm white / white / warm
  • Timing setting: 3 minutes(one press)/ 30 minutes( twice)/60 miutes(three times)
  • Mode select: Sleeping mode / Reading mode

SUPER BRIGHT DESK LAMP, SUITABLE for DETAILED OPERATION

Product Description

ACTIVITY LOG NOTEPAD

These activity logs are helpful for work, home, personal and professional use. The format of this activity log allows for tracking date, starting time, and ending time. Use a single line or multiple lines to describe the appointment, task, or contact. It has a blank line at the top of each sheet to title each activity log sheet. Use one or many sheets for each project. FINALLY, a versatile activity log that can be used for many purposes and timeframes.

Page Size – 8.5″ x 11″ 50 Pages

This activity log is helpful for work, school, home and personal use . The format of this activity log include date, start, end, and appointment task or contact completion. Overall, this simple task tracker book is ideal for your time management and boost Productivity .

Activity Log Notepad focuses on meeting any of your needs . This Activity Log Notepad helps you make the most out of each day by optimizing your time and maximizing output with effective task prioritization and completion. Makes daily plan and task completing easy .

The size of this activity log notepad is 8.5×11 inches and includes 50 sheets which are large enough for your daily scheduling, and are suitable for business, office, home, and school use. You can carry on with you during the daily is a perfect gift.

To Do List Notepads, Activity Log Notepads, Weekly To Do List Notepads & Hourly Planner Notepads. Simple & Versatile Planner Pads, Made in the USA!

Getting Organized?

Vertical To Do List Notepad Horizontal Weekly To Do List Notepad Horizontal Weekly To Do List Notepads Vertical To Do List Notepads Vertical To Do List Notepad

Activity Log Notepad. These activity logs are helpful for work, home, personal and professional use. The format of this activity log allows for tracking date, starting time, and ending time. Use a single line or multiple lines to describe the appointment, task, or contact. It has a blank line at the top of each sheet to title each activity log sheet. Use one or many sheets for each project. FINALLY, a versatile activity log that can be used for many purposes and timeframes.
Daily Activity Log. This activity log is a valuable tool for tracking time used throughout the workday. An excellent time management tool that helps understand how the day is spent. You might be interested in making your day more productive or assisting employees in making the most of their time
Client File Folder Activity Log. Log client or customer-specific activities. If your business has customers and clients, it is important to log the specific tasks you complete on their behalf or for them. Logging the time spent in that effort is also crucial. Real Estate Agents, Accountants, Lawyers, Insurance Agents, Salespeople, etc
Incoming or Outgoing Call Activity Log. Salespeople should have a daily goal of how many outgoing calls are made per day to generate business. Logging sales calls can help forecast how much effort it takes to close each sale. This activity log could also be used to track outgoing email blasts or mailings. Sales managers are wise to require these activity logs for employees to document their efforts.
Project Activity Log. In home life and at work, we are all in charge of completing projects. Stocking inventory, building a website, creating an advertisement campaign, taking photographs, packing for a trip. Each project has a series of steps that need to be completed to be successful. Log the tasks it takes to complete a project.

Life Charge

Being Organized is AWESOME!
